titles.title: A bill for the relief of Thomas Wilson.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 1/26/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual to reimburse him for medical expenses he incurred for his son before he became eligible for medical insurance under the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973.
